text: Godhead (or godhood) refers to the divine nature of the Christian God. Most of time used to refer to God existing in three divine persons.Godhead at merriam- webster.com. Retrieved 29 November 2022.Godhead at dictionary.com. Retrieved 29 November 2022. == Related pages == * Trinity * Homoousion == References == Category:Christian terminology
title: Godhead in Christianity
